price: Yeroo isaan argan "dhugumatti, isaan kun jallattoota" jedhu.
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ra-awhum qālū inna hāulāi laḍāllūna
